alert.note: Alert for Northern New Haven; Southern Middlesex; Southern New Haven; Southern New London (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued January 13 at 10:03AM EST until January 13 at 11:00AM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM EST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...In Connecticut, Northern New Haven, Southern New Haven, Southern Middlesex and Southern New London Counties. In New York, Northeast Suffolk, Southwest Suffolk and Southeast Suffolk Counties. * WHEN...Until 11 AM EST this morning. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Northern New Haven; Southern Middlesex; Southern New Haven; Southern New London
